amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the expenditure of funds for any activity in connection with a scenic shoreline drive in Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore in Michigan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 32 in the Congressional Record of June 18, 1996, to prohibit the use of any funds appropriated in the bill for design, planning, implementation, engineering, construction, or any other activity in connection with a scenic shoreline drive in Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stupak amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
